participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and adventurous, with a flair for creativity in the kitchen.
participant_1.background: My parents are my heroes. I like to learn about the world, but I do not always listen to my doctor. I wake up and check my phone for messages from potential dates. I live alone and cook for myself. I still enjoy my meat but have become a responsible adult.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and humble, always eager to learn and explore new opportunities.
participant_2.background: I'm adjusting to college life and still trying to find my way around. I like to go to the casino on weekends. My most valuable thing is my ability to stay humble, even in the face of great wealth. I spend my spare time watching TV and working on my gaming startup. I try to distract myself with music or by reading a book.

content.text: Not bad, not bad. Just got back from a long day of school.
Oh yeah? What do you study?
I'm trying to get into the gaming industry.
Cool, I've heard good things about that industry.
Yeah, it's pretty fun. I like to work on my own projects in my spare time.
That's awesome, what are you working on right now?
Right now I'm working on a new game concept. It's a little different than anything else out there.
That sounds interesting. I'd love to see it when it's finished.
Maybe I'll send you a copy when it's done.
Thanks! What about you? What do you do for fun?
I like to cook. I'm pretty good at it.
Really? That's awesome! I love to eat, so I'd love to try your cooking sometime.
Sure, I'd love to cook for you.
That's great! Just let me know when you're free.
